## 統計データと地理空間データの紐付け

統計データとして、平成17年、22年、27年に行われた国勢調査による人口データを使います。このデータはe-statよりダウンロード可能です。

```{r}
df_h17to27_pops <- 
  read_rds(here::here("data-raw", "population_h17-h22.rds"))

glimpse(df_h17to27_pops)
```

紐づける空間データを用意しましょう。今回は統計調査が全国の市区町村単位で実施されているため、国土数値情報の行政区域データを利用します。

ここでは岡山県のデータを使った例を示します。

```{r}
sf_pref33 <- 
  jpn_pref(33)

glimpse(sf_pref33)
```

```{r}
df_pops_pref33 <- 
  df_h17to27_pops %>% 
  filter(city != "全国") %>% 
  filter(pref_code == "33", city_type %in% c(1, 2, 3))
```




### facet

```{r}


df_h17to27_pops %>% 
  distinct(city_type, .keep_all = TRUE)

sf_pref33 <- 
  sf_pref33 %>% 
  mutate(city_code = if_else(stringr::str_detect(city, "[[:space:]].+区$"), 
                             stringr::str_replace(city_code, ".{1}$", "0"),
                             city_code),
         city = stringr::str_remove(city, "[[:space:]].+区$"),
         city = stringr::str_remove(city, "^.+郡[[:space:]]")) %>% 
  group_by(city_code, city) %>% 
  tidyr::nest()

city_union <- function(x) {
  x %>% 
    lwgeom::st_make_valid() %>% 
    sf::st_union(by_feature = FALSE) %>% 
    sf::st_transform(crs = 4326) %>% 
    sf::st_cast("POLYGON") %>% 
    purrr::map(
      ~ .x[1]
    ) %>% 
    sf::st_multipolygon() %>% 
    sf::st_sfc(crs = 4326)
}

sf_pref33 <- 
  sf_pref33 %>% 
  transmute(city_code,
            city,
            geometry = purrr::map(data, ~ city_union(.x)) %>% 
              purrr::reduce(c)) %>% 
  st_sf()


sf_pref33 %>% 
  anti_join(df_pops_pref33, by = c("city_code", 
                      "city"))
df_pops_pref33 %>% 
  anti_join(sf_pref33, by = c("city_code", 
                              "city"))

df_pops_pref33 %>% 
  filter(city == "浅口市")

df_pops_pref33 <- 
  df_pops_pref33 %>% 
  mutate(city_code = recode(
    city_code,
    `33201` = "33100",
    `33303` = "33100",
    `33321` = "33100",
    `33345` = "33346",
    `33442` = "33216",
    `33443` = "33216",
    `33444` = "33216",
  )) %>% 
  group_by(year, city_code) %>% 
  mutate(population = sum(population)) %>% 
  ungroup()

df_pops_pref33 <- 
  sf_pref33 %>% 
  inner_join(df_pops_pref33, by = c("city_code", 
                       "city"))

ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = df_pops_pref33, aes(fill = population)) +
  scale_fill_viridis_c() +
  facet_wrap(~ year)

df_pops_pref33 <- 
  df_pops_pref33 %>% 
  group_by(year) %>% 
  mutate(cls = dplyr::ntile(population, 9)) %>% 
  ungroup()

ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = df_pops_pref33, aes(fill = population), 
          color = "white", size = 0.1) +
  scale_fill_viridis_c(guide = guide_legend(title = "Population")) +
  facet_wrap(~ year)

ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = df_pops_pref33, aes(fill = as.character(cls)),
          color = "white", size = 0.1) +
  scale_fill_viridis_d(guide = guide_legend(title = "Class", 
                                            reverse = TRUE)) +
  theme_light() +
  facet_wrap(~ year)
```

### geofacet

```{r}
df_h17to27_pops <- 
  readr::read_rds(here::here("data-raw", "population_h17-h22.rds"))

d <-
  df_h17to27_pops %>% 
  filter(city != "全国") %>% 
  filter(city_type == "a") %>% 
  arrange(pref_code, year) %>% 
  group_by(pref_code) %>% 
  mutate(increace = if_else(population > lag(population), TRUE, FALSE)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  arrange(year, pref_code) %>% 
  mutate(name = rep(jp_prefs_grid1$name, 3))
```

```{r}
d %>% 
  count(pref_code) %>% 
  filter(!between(n, 3, 3))
```

```{r}
p_base <- 
  d %>% 
  ggplot(aes(year, population)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = increace)) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("TRUE"  = viridisLite::viridis(2)[1], 
                                "FALSE" = viridisLite::viridis(2)[2]),
                     na.value = "gray") +
  geom_line(color = "gray") +
  guides(color = guide_legend(title = "人口の増加"))
```

```{r}
p_base +
  facet_wrap(~ pref_code,
             scales = "free_y")
```
```{r}
p_base + 
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(2005, 2010, 2015)) +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma, 
                     breaks = c(500000, 1500000, 3000000)) +
  facet_geo(~ name, 
            grid = "jp_prefs_grid1",
            scales = "free_y") +
  theme_light() +
  theme(legend.position = "top",
        legend.direction = "horizontal",
        axis.text    = element_text(size = 5.2),
        strip.text.x = element_text(size = 7.6))
```
